body.p: The undersigned citizens of Nicholas County, would respectfully petition Your Excellency to release Leonard Sheilds from the State Prison at Frankfort, he was sent from this (Nicholas) County at the March Term 1865 of the Circuit Court for horse stealing there was a great many mitigating circumstances in this favor and it was his first offence previous to that time he bore the Character of an industrious harmless person. he has a wife & several small children who are now in the poor house of the County it will be a great benefit to them and the County if you will discharge him, he is certainly an object deserving Executive Clemency hoping You will grant our prayer we are your Excellencys obedient servents.
